## a.datetime() function

A date time scalar type that is represented server-side as an extended ISO 8601 date and time string in the format `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function datetime(): ModelField<Nullable<string>, never, undefined, ModelFieldType.DateTime>;
```
**Returns:**

[ModelField](./data-schema.modelfield.md)<!-- -->&lt;[Nullable](./data-schema.nullable.md)<!-- -->&lt;string&gt;, never, undefined, ModelFieldType.DateTime&gt;

datetime field definition
